cause.description:
Keep the institution of mariage a sacred act by keeping marriage between a man and a woman in every state of the United States
1. Marriage: One Man and One Woman in the U.S.A.
2. Ban Gay Marriage in the U.S.A.
3. Restore Morals in the U.S.A.
cause.mission: Keep Marriage Between a Man and a Woman!
cause.name: Save Marriage: One Man and One Woman!
